title: The Theology And Spirituality of Mary Tudor's Church
description: Few areas of early modern English history have roused such passions and interpretations as the rule of Mary Tudor and her efforts to return the country to Catholicism following the reigns of her father and brother. In this book, Dr. Wizeman explores Catholic theology and spirituality according to the religious literature printed during the reign of Mary Tudor (1553-58).
author: William Wizeman
